status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Appcelerator Modules
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Modules here.

fields.description:
Hi

I have used the facebook example (module) directly from the documentation which used to work earlier but doesn`t work now.

After I click on the "Login With Facebook" button in my app, it takes me to safari and asks me to authorize the app. I click "Allow" and instead of returning me to my app it shows an alert box saying...
"Cannot Open Page Safari can not open the page because the address is invalid"
fields.summary: Facebook Login Problem "Safari can not open the page because the address is invalid"

comments.body:
This could happen if your Facebook application ID doesn't match with your tiapp.xml FACEBOOK_APP_ID property.

Can you please confirm if FACEBOOK_APP_ID property in your tiapp.xml file matches with your Facebook application ID?

<property name="ti.facebook.appid">FACEBOOK_APP_ID</property>

http://docs.appcelerator.com/titanium/latest/#!/api/Modules.Facebook

i was using facebook.appid .
The problem has been resolved thanks :)
